About me

Why, hello friends! Thanks for stopping by. I’m Anja, an outdoorsy, never sit still, travel addict. I’m based out of Seattle, WA, but can be found globetrotting most of the time. This site is a collection of my favorite photos from around the world and some stories and suggestions to go along with them. My bucket list is full of new places, but I’m always looking for new ideas. I hope my photos can inspire and be a resource for those of you making your own adventures across the globe. Get in touch if you have any questions about locations or if you have any suggestions for places I haven’t been. See you out there! With love, Anja
